DavidMohrhardt.animator

Class FrameData

  • java.lang.Object
    • DavidMohrhardt.animator.FrameData

  • public class FrameData
extends java.lang.Object
    Version:
    0.01 This is the animator package. This file is the FrameData Object. It is essentially an object that stores the information needed to find the place where the action frame is on the sprite sheet. The Sprite uses this object as a part of the HashMap of actions to indicate where the action is on the sprite sheet.
    Author:
    David Mohrhardt

    • Constructor Detail

      • FrameData

        public FrameData(java.lang.String action_name,
                 int action_row,
                 int number_columns)
        FrameData(String action_name, int action_row, int number_columns)
        Parameters:
        action_name - The name of the action that corresponds with this frame data
        action_row - The row on the sprite sheet that contains the action that corresponds with this FrameData
        number_columns - The number of Frames that makeup this column of animation.
